author: Xiaomi
description:
On Oct 28th, 2024, Xiaomi EV secured its first officially certified Nürburgring lap time.

A year later, we present this one-year anniversary tribute — the full version of the documentary about the prototype and the production model of the #XiaomiSU7Ultra Nürburgring challenge.

Let’s relive the efforts and triumphs of this remarkable year together.

title: Xiaomi SU7 Ultra Conquering the Nürburgring｜6'22''091
